Uses of Package
org.hibernate.tuple.component

  • Packages that use org.hibernate.tuple.component 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.tuple.component  
    org.hibernate.type
    A Hibernate Type is a strategy for mapping a Java property type to a JDBC type or types.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.tuple.component used by org.hibernate.tuple.component 
    Class and Description
    AbstractComponentTuplizer
    Support for tuplizers relating to components.
    ComponentTuplizer
    Defines further responsibilities regarding tuplization based on a mapped components.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.tuple.component used by org.hibernate.type 
    Class and Description
    ComponentMetamodel
    Centralizes metamodel information about a component.
    ComponentTuplizer
    Defines further responsibilities regarding tuplization based on a mapped components.
